name: Trick or Treat Neighborhood
description:
Trick or Treat Neighborhood is a local tabletop multiplayer game where players must solve an enigma on a typical American neighborhood during Halloween. With a low poly visual and compelling soundtrack, two players compete to enigma. 

If you knock the right door, you can get a treat, a piece of the enigma. If you knock the wrong door, you will get a trick, where you can get the piece of the mysterious phrase if you win a challenge minigame. For every treat or minigame they won, a word of the enigma is solved. First player solving the enigma wins!
